content: direct link to pattern pdf 1 pattern is japanese but fully charted using standard knitting & crochet symbols the pattern includes instructions for four different tawashi/scrubbies three crocheted and one knit calls for japanese hook size 8/0 4 5mm for the crocheted ones and size 10 knitting needles 5 0mm gauge is different for all four of these **ring-crocheted tawashi** pattern at top of pdf where it says リング編みのたわしちゃん gauge 12st/11rows in 10x10 in pattern stitch 1 single_crochet through back loop only and 12st/9rows in pattern stitch 2 ring stitch - i m sorry but i don t recognize that name - presumably it s how you get the little loops on one side of the mitt **crocheted tawashi** pattern in middle left of pdf where it says カギ針編みのたわしちゃん no gauge listed **grid tawashi** pattern in middle right of pdf where it says 方眼編みのたわしちゃん gauge 13st/5rows in 10x10 in pattern stitch **garter stitch tawashi** pattern at bottom of pdf where it says ガーター編みのたわしちゃん gauge 14st/24rows in 10x10 in pattern stitch 1 http //www gosyo co jp/img/acrobat/9798/22 pdf
